message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I propose a price of $9,500 for it. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity cost for me in terms of selling it to other potential buyers. I understand that it might be a significant investment, but I am confident that it will provide substantial returns for you. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration.
